turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Maria. I need you to call Marco's Pizza and place an order for me, please. We're going to have to work late at the office, and I want to make sure everyone is fed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Do you want the Marco's in Patrick Street Plaza, then?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that one is the closest.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What kind of pizzas do you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's start with an extra large Pepperoni Magnifico, and a Deluxe Uno.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Should I leave all the default toppings on?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes-- can you throw in a medium cheese pizza in there too. I nearly forgot that Charles is a vegetarian.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. According to the website, they're out of mushrooms so the Deluxe Uno won't have any. Is that fine?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah I guess so.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What do they want to drink with their pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me ask real quick. Can you look up what desserts they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, it looks like they have Cinna Squares and Double Chocolate Brownies.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Those sound good. What do the Cinna Squares come with?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They come with cups of icing on the side.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, let's get that. Everyone says that Mountain Dew is fine, so two two litres of that and then one litre of Pepsi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay... The website says they don't have any Mountain Dew left, but they have Sierra Mist. Is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Uhh... Just one of the Sierra Mists then and two bottles of Pepsi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem. Do you want to order any sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sides do they have again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have Cheesy Bread and a Meatball Bake.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One order of Cheesy Bread will do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I added it to the order. Do you need anything else for tonight?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So one extra large Pepperoni Magnificio, one Deluxe Uno without mushrooms, one medium cheese, one order of cheesy bread, two litres of Pepsi, and one Sierra Mist?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem. I put in the order, and it will be available for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, I will go pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, good. The receipt should arrive via text message to your phone shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, just got it. Thanks, Maria. Talk to you later.
